page.title: 03CLUBS
page.content: In Wingrave quite a few clubs have been formed. The clubs range from eight year olds to adult. There is a Senior Drama group, and a Junior Drama group. The senior drama group is mostly for adults and teenagers. The junior drama group is for children from the age of eight. There is also Guides, Scouts, Cubs, and Brownies. Which are all ,apart from the Scouts, held in the school. A Youth Club has also been formed for eight to twelve year olds, and one for teenagers. The Methodist church has also formed a youth club, where they hold barbeques and bike rides. There is also a Tennis club and Adult and Under 12 Football clubs.
